div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 288 Salamis, Attica, 1936 (890) Burial: c. 125 B.C. or later (T); c. 100 (Lewis) Contents: 36+ AR, 4 AE? Athens: 29 New Style tetradr. 7 New Style dr. 4AE Disposition: Athens Thompson, Athens, pp. 518-9; NC 1962, p. 314 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 283
